question: Which is the only country in the world that forms the habitat of "Saimaa ringed seal"?
explanation: Saimaa Ringed Seal (Pusa hispida saimensis) is one of the rarest seals in the world. It is a subspecies of ringed seal. The only existing population of these seals is found in Lake Saimaa, Finland. According to the IUCN's Red List of Threatened Species, it is an endangered seal species.
